common.model

Class Selection

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.model.Selection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<AbstractSquare>

    public class Selection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<AbstractSquare>
    This class is used by Controllers when making selections on the board. Squares are stored in the selection in the order they are added. No square may be added twice to the same selection.
    Author:
    Nicholas Panzarino, jasirocki - jdoc
